settings.heading: GUIDE TO SEZZLE & KLARNA
settings.row_content:
SHOP & ADD ITEMS TO YOUR CART

  • When ready, click checkout

CHOOSE SEZZLE or KLARNA at CHECKOUT

  • A debit or credit card is required 
  • Choose Sezzle or Klarna as your payment option
  • You must be 18 years of age or older
  • You must be able to receive text messages to US or Canadian Number 

LOGIN OR CREATE AN ACCOUNT

  • In order to finish your transaction, you will need to login or create an account via KLARNA or SEZZLE site
  • Once your account is created you can use it anytime with multiple vendors

COMPLETE YOUR PURCHASE

  • Your payment will be broken down into “4 Installments, to be paid every two weeks”
  • The first of four payment is due immediately at the time of purchase
  • The remaining three payments will be automatically deducted every two weeks, via your selected payment option.
